meanings.definition: Of or relating to the male reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The antheral flowers released pollen for reproduction.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the antheral characteristics were specific to males.
meanings.sent3: The antheral plants were quite popular with the bees in the garden.
meanings.sent4: His antheral strength was like that of a mighty oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The antheral scent of the cologne attracted many admirers.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of or pertaining to males.
meanings.sent1: She admired his antheral physique and strength.
meanings.sent2: The antheral behavior of the lion showed dominance in the pride.
meanings.sent3: The antheral pride in his appearance was evident in his confident stride.
meanings.sent4: His antheral voice boomed across the room, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The antheral energy of the sports team led them to victory.
